We have a very special offer for you today. HostingBox is a newly launched brand. We encourage your feedback as it will help us grow. HostingBox specializes in Shared, Reseller, VPS, and Dedicated Hosting. Our goal is to offer high quality products at a low end cost.  
   
**VPS 1024 Xen** (Extremely Limited)  
   
   * 1GB Dedicated RAM  
   * 1 Dedicated Core  
   * 15GB SSD Storage   
   * 1.5TB Bandwidth  
   * 1 IPv4  
   
$7/month with Promo Code: **LET**  
[Order in Frankfurt, Germany](http://hostingbox.us/index.php?cmd=cart&action=add&id=41)   
[Order in London, UK](http://hostingbox.us/index.php?cmd=cart&action=add&id=28)   
[Order in Chicago, Illinois](http://hostingbox.us/index.php?cmd=cart&action=add&id=42)   
    
**Resource Bundles (OpenVZ)**  
    
   * 4GB RAM   
   * 100 GB Storage  
   * 2TB Bandwidth  
   * 8 Cores  
   * 5 IPv4  
    
$7/Month or $18/Quarter   
[Order Now](http://hostingbox.us/index.php?cmd=cart&action=add&id=40)  
Resource Bundles are located in Lenoir, North Carolina and hosted on either Dual L5520 or E3-1220 with at least 32GB Ram and in Raid 1.   
    
**FREE CREDIT!**   
Receive $5 in account credit for following us on Twitter! Just submit a ticket with your twitter username and we'll add the credit.   
Follow us on [Twitter](https://twitter.com/HostingBox_us)  
  
Payment Methods:  
PayPal  
Bitcoin
